response: "{ \"title\": \"Harshad Numbers Checker\", \"description\": \"A Harshad number, also known as a Niven number, is an integer that is divisible by the sum of its digits. Write a function `is_harshad` that takes an integer `n` and returns `True` if it's a Harshad number, `False` otherwise.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef is_harshad(n: int) -> bool:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `n` (int): A positive integer.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns `True` if the input integer is a Harshad number, `False` otherwise.\\n\", \"code\": \"def is_harshad(n: int) -> bool:\\n    sum_of_digits = 0\\n    for digit in str(n):\\n        sum_of_digits += int(digit)\\n    return n % sum_of_digits == 0\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert is_harshad(18) == True\", \"assert is_harshad(12) == False\", \"assert is_harshad(36) == True\", \"assert is_harshad(48) == True\"] }"
